articles.author: Colby Itkowitz
articles.title: Trump says Pelosi is worst House speaker in history. Twitter remembers Dennis Hastert.
articles.description: Saturday morning tweet was the third time in 24 hours the president attacked the California Democrat, following her announcing that the impeachment process will proceed next week.
articles.content: She is obsessed with impeachment, she has done nothing. She is going to go down as one of the worst Speakers in the history of our country, Trump said Friday night during an interview with Fox Newss Laura Ingraham. And shes become a crazed lunatic. But she wi… [+2359 chars]

articles.author: Steve Douglas | AP
articles.title: Strikers offering ray of light for inconsistent Man United
articles.description: There is a ray of light in an often bleak season for Manchester United in the flourishing attacking combination of Marcus Rashford and Anthony Martial
articles.content:
Rashford who netted the first two goals, including one from the penalty spot -- is up to 19 goals in all competitions, already making this season the most prolific of his burgeoning career with more than four months left.
Martial, playing as an out-and-out c… [+1181 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Correction: Iran-Plane Crash-Echoes of 1988 story
articles.description: In a story January 10, 2020, about an Iranian passenger jet shot down by American forces in 1988, The Associated Press erroneously reported the name of the ship that struck a mine in the Persian Gulf
articles.content: DUBAI, United Arab Emirates In a story January 10, 2020, about an Iranian passenger jet shot down by American forces in 1988, The Associated Press erroneously reported the name of a ship that struck a mine in the Persian Gulf. it was the USS Samuel B. Roberts… [+33 chars]

articles.author: Daniella Matar | AP
articles.title: Ibrahimović scores to help Milan win 2-0 at Cagliari
articles.description: Zlatan Ibrahimović has scored in his first start back at AC Milan to end the Rossoneri’s goalless run and help them to a 2-0 win at Cagliari in Serie A
articles.content:
The Swede raised his arms above his head in celebration and then turned to the AC Milan fans, pumping his fist and encouraging their chants for him.
Ibrahimovi, who helped Milan to its last Serie A title in 2011, has rejoined the Italian club until the end o… [+1173 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Syria airstrikes kill 10 in rebel-held area despite truce
articles.description: Syrian opposition activists say government warplanes have struck several rebel-held areas in the country's northwest. The activists said the strikes killed at least 10 people and wounding dozens on Saturday
articles.content:
Russia is a main backer of Syrian President Bashar Assad, while Turkey is a strong supporter of some of the insurgents fighting against him. Moscow blamed the insurgents for violating the truce Saturday.
Idlib is dominated by al-Qaida-linked militants, and i… [+1394 chars]

articles.title: Britons muse on Megxit: 'Diana would be so proud'
articles.description: What do Brits make of Harry and Meghan "stepping back" from royal duties?
articles.content:
But the maverick course set by the Duke and Duchess of Sussex seems just fine to many watching it unfold as a sort of royal soap opera, replete with grumpy in-laws, a baffled father and questions over who will pay the bills.

articles.title: German and Russian leaders meet to discuss Mideast tensions
articles.description: German Chancellor Angela Merkel has arrived in Moscow for talks with Russian President Vladimir Putin amid growing tensions in the Middle East and elsewhere
articles.content:
Merkel and German Foreign Minister Heiko Maas traveled to the Russian capital for discussions about international hot spots such as Iran, Syria, Libya, Iraq, Ukraine. Merkel met with Putin in the afternoon.

articles.title: Buttigieg’s black-voter problem, by the numbers
articles.description: A new Washington Post/Ipsos poll suggests its deeper than that.
articles.content:
Pete Buttigieg got his first endorsement from a black member of Congress on Thursday, when Rep. Anthony G. Brown (D-Md.) backed him. And in announcing his support, Brown addressed Buttigiegs struggles with black voters.

articles.author: Scott Clement
articles.title: Biden holds wide lead among black voters in Democratic presidential race, Post-Ipsos poll finds
articles.description: The survey, one of the most extensive studies to date on the views of African Americans about the 2020 election, finds that defeating President Trump is personally important to an overwhelming majority in that group.
articles.content: The survey finds meager support for former South Bend, Ind., mayor Pete Buttigieg, who is among the leaders in polls in the predominantly white states of Iowa and New Hampshire but stands at 2 percent among Democratic black voters nationally. A lack of famili… [+12458 chars]
